üîñ Copyright Notice
This video is non-monetized. All rights belong to the original copyright holders. The music is a remake of the Super Robot Wars A main theme ‚ÄúKiwamete Chikaku, Kagirinaku Tooi Sekai ni.‚Äù

‚≠ê Community Update
Membership has dropped to 49, but I sincerely thank everyone for your support‚Äîspecial thanks to ‚ÄúWang Yuan Qikai‚Äù for rejoining!

üí† RTX5090 Funding Progress
$40 / $3000

üìù Creator‚Äôs Log
Inspired by my childhood favorite GBA title Super Robot Wars A. Originally planned as a pure music release, but I spent an extra 4 days experimenting with new techniques and widescreen production. Special thanks to Char for his improvised performance‚Äîabsolutely loved it!

üé• Visual Production

Huge thanks to HAILUO AI for providing a PRO account. This and the next video were mainly generated with it.

Used NANO BANANA to enhance images (adding instruments, merging backgrounds). Resolution is low, but I‚Äôm satisfied.

Tried VEO3 for Char‚Äôs performance‚Äîtop-tier resolution and realism, but extremely costly.

Widescreen took a lot of extra effort; I‚Äôll likely return to 4:3 ratio next time.

Even with 4K, the native resolution was too low to fully restore facial details in mid shots or close-ups.

üé∂ Music Production
This remake is based on the GBA version. Although there‚Äôs a PSP version, I prefer the punch of the GBA sound.

üì¢ Next Week‚Äôs Preview
Working on the next Gundam X OP! The Moonlight Cannon will be realized with the help of HAILUO AI.
